fields.Title of Presentation: IDeas and Possibilities for Holistic Nursing Concepts in Theory and Clinical: A hybrid course
fields.Conference Location: Boise State University SUB Boise, ID
fields.Sponsoring Organization: Boise State University School of Nursing
fields.Description/Abstract:
Title: IDeas and Possibilities for Holistic Nursing Concepts in Theory and Clinical: A hybrid course
Presenter: Marty Downey, MSN, PhD, RN, AHN-BC, CHTP, CNE
School: Boise State University School of Nursing, 1910 University Dr., Boise, ID 83725-1840
Purpose/Aim/description:
Academic nursing programs are often limited in Holistic Nursing program offerings. In nursing programs at all levels of education and practice, there is a gap in education courses to introduce the history, philosophy, theories of Holistic nursing utilizing a combination of on-ground and online program.     Upper level course electives in Holistic Nursing may increase awareness of holistic health practices within the academic and practice settings within nursing programs globally. An interactive presentation of the content and design of the Holistic Nursing Care elective course will be presented, discussed and demonstrated.
